entry.title: a step by step diffusion models

link.title: a step by step diffusion models

entry.content:
Introduction

Diffusion model … \(\sum_{k=1}^\infty |\langle x, e_k \rangle|^2 \leq \|x\|^2\)

\[\begin{equation}\label{eq: test} \sum_{k=1}^\infty |\langle x, e_k \rangle|^2 \leq \|x\|^2 \end{equation}\]

You \eqref{eq: test} can also use \begin{equation}...\end{equation} instead of $$ for display mode math. MathJax will automatically number equations:

\begin{equation} \label{eq:cauchy-schwarz} \left( \sum{k=1}^n a_k b_k \right)^2 \leq \left( \sum{k=1}^n ak^2 \right) \left( \sum{k=1}^n b_k^2 \right) \end{equation}

and by adding \label{...} inside the equation environment, we can now refer to the equation using \eqref.

Note that MathJax 3 is a major re-write of MathJax that brought a significant improvement to the loading and rendering speed, which is now on par with KaTeX.

entry.summary: Introduction In process … \(\begin{equation}\label{eq: test} \sum_{k=1}^\infty |\langle x, e_k \rangle|^2 \leq \|x\|^2 \end{equation}\)
